programme.title: Próba niewinności Agathy Christie
programme.desc: Boże Narodzenie 1954 roku. Zamożna filantropka Rachel Argyll (Anna Chancellor) zostaje zamordowana w swojej rodzinnej posiadłości. Podejrzenia zostają skierowane na jej adoptowanego syna, Jacka (Anthony Boyle), który trafia do aresztu. W prowadzonym śledztwie pojawia się jednak coraz więcej wątpliwości. Trzymająca w napięciu adaptacja prozy mistrzyni gatunku - Agathy Christie.

We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: ABC Agathy Christie
programme.desc: Rok 1933. Emerytowany belgijski detektyw Herkules Poirot (John Malkovich) stara się wytropić wyrafinowanego seryjnego zabójcę, który wysyła tajemnicze listy podpisane "ABC". Śledczy musi je rozszyfrować, aby odkryć tożsamość niebezpiecznego przestępcy. Wspiera go inspektor Crome (Rubert Grint). Trzymająca w napięciu adaptacja prozy mistrzyni gatunku - Agathy Christie - z nominowanym w karierze dwukrotnie do Oscara ("Miejsca w sercu", "Na linii ognia") Johnem Malkovichem.

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: ABC Agathy Christie
programme.desc: Rok 1933. Emerytowany belgijski detektyw Herkules Poirot (John Malkovich) stara się wytropić wyrafinowanego seryjnego zabójcę, który wysyła tajemnicze listy podpisane "ABC". Śledczy musi je rozszyfrować, aby odkryć tożsamość niebezpiecznego przestępcy. Wspiera go inspektor Crome (Rubert Grint). Trzymająca w napięciu adaptacja prozy mistrzyni gatunku - Agathy Christie - z nominowanym w karierze dwukrotnie do Oscara ("Miejsca w sercu", "Na linii ognia") Johnem Malkovichem.

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

programme.title: Acid Rain
programme.desc: Młoda ucieka z domu. Podróżuje autostopem. Poznaje niezrównoważonego dziwaka Chudego. Pod osłoną nocy snują się po mieście, docierają w coraz dziwniejsze rejony, doświadczając niezwykłych emocji.

programme.title: Wolyn
Wołyń
programme.desc:
Wolyn: Directed by Wojciech Smarzowski. With Michalina Labacz, Arkadiusz Jakubik, Wasyl Wasylik, Adrian Zaremba. Despite being in love with a Ukrainian boy from the same village, Polish girl named Zosia is forced into marrying a wealthy widower. Soon World War II begins and ethnic tensions arise. Amidst the war chaos Zosia tries to survive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6068960/","name":"Wolyn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM4YTk3NzgtMmUxNy00NThlLWE3YzctOWJhNmQ4OTBiZTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY4MDEwMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Despite being in love with a Ukrainian boy from the same village, Polish girl named Zosia is forced into marrying a wealthy widower. Soon World War II begins and ethnic tensions arise. Amidst the war chaos Zosia tries to survive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6068960/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ktrelski"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Prepare yourself for sleepless night","reviewBody":"When I went to see this movie I thought I know everything about the events this picture is based on. I have heard that the movie will show them without any censorship. However, I was not prepared for the real horror of those events. The movie is graphic, but it does not go overboard. It does, however touch your soul. If you ever asked yourself what the real terror looks like, this is it. What makes it tough is that the terror is brought to you by the people you know well, your next door neighbors, your spouse or even your brother.

Do not expect anybody laughing or even talking after the movie is over. 

It is a great movie. Don't miss it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5393,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Drama","History","War"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"genocide,year 1943,world war two,massacre,nudity","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8443804/","name":"Michalina Labacz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1458971/","name":"Arkadiusz Jakubik"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8443805/","name":"Wasyl Wasylik"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500530/","name":"Wojciech Smarzowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692063/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692062/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500530/","name":"Wojciech Smarzowski"}],"duration":"PT2H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Das Vorspiel
Przesłuchanie
Das Vorspiel
programme.desc: Das Vorspiel: Directed by Ina Weisse. With Nina Hoss, Sophie Rois, Thorsten Merten, Franziska Fauth. Anna Bronsky is a violin teacher at the Conservatoire. Against the advice of her colleagues, she imposes the admission of a pupil, in whom she sees a great talent. With a lot of involvement, she prepares Alexander for the end-of-year exam and neglects her young son Jonas, who is also a violinist and ice hockey fan. She moves away more and more from her husband, so fond of him, the French "luthier" Philippe Bronsky. At the approach of audition, Anna pushes Alexander towards performances more and more exceptional. The decisive day, an accident occurs, heavy consequence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8620154/","name":"Das Vorspiel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjRkNDgzNmItYzAwZC00ZWE4LTliZjUtM2MyNGU2ODBhYjhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTQwMDA5NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Anna Bronsky is a violin teacher at the Conservatoire. programme.desc: Cykl prezentujący wyselekcjonowany zbiór najlepszych filmów krótkometrażowych. Wiele z nich nagrodzonych zostało prestiżowymi wyróżnieniami na międzynarodowych galach i festiwalach filmowych. Każde pasmo przedstawia kilka produkcji na dany temat.

programme.title: Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché
Bądź sobą, czyli nieopowiedziana historia Alice Guy-Blaché
Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché
programme.desc: Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché: Directed by Pamela B. Green. With Alice Guy, Jodie Foster, Pamela B. Green, Catherine Hardwicke. Pamela B. Green's energetic film about pioneer filmmaker Alice Guy-Blaché is both a tribute and a detective story, tracing the circumstances by which this extraordinary artist faded from memory and the path toward her reclamation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3146022/","name":"Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQwNTM4MjctMDljMi00ZTNiLWJjNWQtZTgzMDczNTkwOTBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI3NDAyNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pamela B. Green's energetic film about pioneer filmmaker Alice Guy-Blaché is both a tribute and a detective story, tracing the circumstances by which this extraordinary artist faded from memory and the path toward her reclamation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3146022/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jfsinil"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just saw this...","reviewBody":"I HAD heard of Guy-Blache, but then I have been a silent film geek for almost 50 years now. Have been catching what I can on-line of her work - so far, 1916 The Ocean Waif is the best, Doris Kenyon was a far more natural actress then Pickford or the Gish sisters based on that film.\n\nI think that Simon could have skipped including so many phone interviews with distance relatives of Guy-Blache, (many of which could have used subtitles, I found them hard to understand) and included some longer clips of her actual films instead. It is obvious that a lot of work went into digging up information on Guy-Blache, and I appreciate it, but would rather have seen more of her work than her family life. Still, I gave it 9 out of 10 stars since the subject matter is so important to film history...and I LOVE the opening postcard collages that take the viewer back in time and across the ocean!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2018-12-07","keywords":"f rated,filmmaking,alice guy blache character,nine word title,colon in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blache","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4115118617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMxMDlhOWItNmEwOS00NzkxLTlmNWUtOTIxNzA1MGZlZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMxMDlhOWItNmEwOS00NzkxLTlmNWUtOTIxNzA1MGZlZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0349785/","name":"Alice Guy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000149/","name":"Jodie Foster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1652669/","name":"Pamela B. Arizona Junior
Raising Arizona
programme.desc: Raising Arizona: Directed by Joel Coen, Ethan Coen. With Nicolas Cage, Holly Hunter, Trey Wilson, John Goodman. When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0093822/","name":"Raising Arizona","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwZTEwZTYtZmQ0OS00NmM1LWE2ZTQtNjZiYmE4ZmUxMjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0093822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bat-5"},"dateCreated":"1998-10-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"pure lunacy","reviewBody":"Pure lunacy is what Raising Arizona is. It's got everything you could ask for in a film; kidnapping, jailbreaks, Hell's Angels, explosions and guns, guns guns. Nic Cage is great in the role of a very befuddled conveniance store robber who falls in love with Holly Hunter's Ed. Throw in John Goodman and William Forsythe as a couple of car stealing, bank robbing brothers and you got yourself scenes that will make you giggle when you think back about them. The entire state of Arizona seems trigger happy in the Coen's eyes. Clerks, cops, and crooks pull out firearms and let loose like the finale of the 1812 Overture. Plus, where else can you hear really good yodeling?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132052,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1987-04-17","keywords":"arizona desert,state name in title,arizona,phoenix arizona,diaper","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"'Buster Scruggs': The Coen Bros.' programme.title: Le couperet
Ostre cięcia
Le Couperet
programme.desc: Le couperet: Directed by Costa-Gavras. With José Garcia, Karin Viard, Geordy Couturiau, Christa Théret. A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0422015/","name":"Le couperet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MDAzNjYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTIzMDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0422015/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Angeneer"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"A frightening reality","reviewBody":"People who characterize this film as a comedy obviously haven't got it. The comic element is just a thin surface. This is a tragic story and a very strong political statement. Obviously Bruno's decisions and actions are absurd, but his circumstances are not. The movie offers an incisive look at the dark reality of chronic unemployment. Corporate greed leads to story after story after story of desperation. Westlake and Gavras know that in order to pass the message you have to lighten up the atmosphere (a la Truman Show), or else the viewer won't sit the whole movie. In order to appreciate the film you have to marginalize the main plot element (the murder story) and concentrate on all the subplots.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7855,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"employment recruiter,competition,outsourcing,contestant elimination,unemployment","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1542634521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNjMWQ4ZmItOTVjMi00YzkxLWIzYmYtOWVjNTg3MDRkMzIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNjMWQ4ZmItOTVjMi00YzkxLWIzYmYtOWVjNTg3MDRkMzIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0305296/","name":"José Garcia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0895759/","name":"Karin Viard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597967/","name":"Geordy Couturiau"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002020/","name":"Costa-Gavras"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922799/","name":"Donald E. programme.title: The Iron Lady
Żelazna Dama
The Iron Lady
programme.desc:
The Iron Lady: Directed by Phyllida Lloyd. With Meryl Streep, Jim Broadbent, Susan Brown, Alice da Cunha. An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1007029/","name":"The Iron Lady","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzNDUyMDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgzOTg3Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1007029/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Loving_Silence"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Meryl Streep gives a spectacular performance in a flawed, but great biopic","reviewBody":"Before viewing, "The Iron Lady", I didn't really know much about Margaret Thatcher. Other than she was the prime minister of England for 11 years, she was a very controversial figure and still is to this day. So I was really interested to see the film and I decided to visit the WGA screening.

Now let me begin by saying, Meryl Streep embodies Margaret Thatcher. She doesn't just look like her, but she talks like her, her facial expressions are spot on. Meryl Streep becomes Margaret Thatcher. I would be shocked if she doesn't win an Oscar for this performance. The supporting cast is good too, Jim Broadbent gives an excellent performance, everyone is just great.

However aside from the top notch acting, the movie had a few flaws. The story was uninteresting at times, the flashback scenes were a bit muddled and a little confusing. The movie felt a little too safe, it tried too hard, not to be controversial. Although I don't entirely blame the film itself for that. Margaret Thatcher was such a decisive person, that whichever side the film picked, it would be criticized by a lot of people. I guess the film ultimately achieved the goal.

I also liked the movie didn't dwell too much on the politics, but on the character of Margaret Thatcher. We see the human side of The Iron Lady herself, beyond all the partisan politics and rumors, we get to see a very personal and sad side of her. The subplot focusing on Thacther's grief over her husband's death, as the older version battles with hallucinations and an unwillingness to let go of her dear Denis are heartbreaking.

Overall the movie was really well done, but just shy of greatness. Meryl Streep's performance and the supporting cast, truly elevates the film into a great biopic. Although I wished a little more time was spent on focusing on her political life, the movie successfully showed a deep and moving side of the prime minister. Which a lot of biopics fail to do. Whatever your opinions might be on Margaret Thatcher, don't fault the movie because of the opinion. And I highly respect Phyllida LLoyd, Meryl Streep, Abi Morgan and others for trying to portray such a decisive and highly controversial figure.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106150,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-01-06","keywords":"10 downing street london,old woman,old age,british conservative party,british female politician","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1047305753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMDYwNzc1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg3OTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMDYwNzc1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg3OTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the life of Margaret Thatcher, the former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, with a focus on the price she paid for power."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000980/","name":"Jim Broadbent"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001290/","name":"Richard E. Grant"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1630273/","name":"Phyllida Lloyd"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242217/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604448/","name":"Abi Morgan"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La virgen de los sicarios
Matka boska morderców
La Virgen de los sicarios
programme.desc: La virgen de los sicarios: Directed by Barbet Schroeder. With Germán Jaramillo, Anderson Ballesteros, Juan David Restrepo, Manuel Busquets. The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. When Alexis himself is fatally gunned down, grief-stricken Fernando hunts for his young lover's killer in the Medellin slums, but instead encounters Wilmar, who bears an uncanny resemblance to Alexis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250809/","name":"La virgen de los sicarios","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgyZGY1OGYtOTRlMy00OWJhLThjYTItZTcxOTdmMDhiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. When Alexi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250809/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jetwimp"},"dateCreated":"2002-08-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"from a respite from dull films, see this","reviewBody":"A middle-aged Colombian writer, disgusted with life and contemptuous of religion, becomes involved sexually and romantically with teen-aged Medellin boys who kill effortlessly and with little provocation. At first appalled, he eventually grows addicted to the deaths the boys bring about, their magical ability to resolve the annoyances of everyday life, such as noisy neighbors and aggressive cab subway riders. The plot has some really astonishing surprises, and the taut nearly flawless script (in Spanish) is a treasure. The film , obviously the product of a philosophically inclined mind (Schroeder studied philosophy at the Sorbonne), is a thinking filmgoer's feast and works on many different levels. The main character's ambivalence about religion (the film's title, and the fact that the writer keeps finding himself in cathedrals) furnishes much matter for reflection. This film is not for everyone--- it is, even for these times, shocking. Those more comfortable with the blowsy and predictable product issuing from Hollywood committees should probably avoid it. But those who treasure the ability of film to explore provocative and original ideas will love it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3887,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-09-20","keywords":"male full frontal nudity,teenage boy,male frontal nudity,anti natalism,antinatalism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Our Lady of the Assassins","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1634731801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBlOTBiYzktZmQ0My00YmI3LThlMzgtN2JhZDVlZTAzZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBlOTBiYzktZmQ0My00YmI3LThlMzgtN2JhZDVlZTAzZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this film from Barbet Schroeder"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418554/","name":"Germán Jaramillo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050774/","name":"Anderson Ballesteros"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720461/","name":"Juan David Restrepo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0775447/","name":"Barbet Schroeder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052216/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086602/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0884982/","name":"Fernando Vallejo"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

credits.actor: Joanna Kulig, Adam Woronowicz, Alan Tybulczuk, Eryk Remański, Szymon Kuś

programme.title: Tamtej nocy
programme.desc: Zuzanna Szwarc (Hanna Konarowska), mama kilkuletniej dziewczynki, pracuje jako kuratorka sztuki. Pewnego wieczoru widzi napad. Dwóch mężczyzna atakuje chłopaka. Zuza nie pozostaje obojętna i stara się go obronić. Kiedy na miejsce przybywa policja, to jednak ona, nie sprawcy pobicia, zostaje aresztowana.

programme.title: Once
Once
programme.desc:
Once: Directed by John Carney. With Glen Hansard, Markéta Irglová, Hugh Walsh, Gerard Hendrick. A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0907657/","name":"Once","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWUxZjJkMDktZmMxMS00Mzg3LTk4MDItN2IwODlmN2E0MTM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0907657/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Chris Knipp"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Perfecton doesn't have to be perfect","reviewBody":"Once is about a young Irish busker with a torn guitar and a raft of achingly felt songs about a girlfriend he lost the year before. He works in Dublin at his dad's Hoover Repair Centre. One day as he's playing on the street a Czech woman who sells roses and cleans houses comes up and starts to talk to him. She's somewhat cool but she's also disarmingly honest. The dialogue seems understated, offhand, but the words seem to come from the heart. She plays the piano (and later reveals she's written some songs herself) and they get together to make music. Both are suffering from love affairs that went wrong. He longs for her but she keeps her distance. The simplicity of the acting makes the characters seem real, like everything else in the movie. It doesn't try too hard. It trusts its material, and it works.

The recording session they wangle with a group of other buskers (two guitarists and a youthful drummer) is a metaphor for this whole film. These people know nothing about recording, but they've got good material and the initially skeptical engineer winds up acknowledging that they've made a beautiful thing.

Once's transitions are a little awkward sometimes and its images aren't fancy, but the story moves you without having any sentimental payoffs. Kitchen sink film-making: it works if you believe in what you're doing. And have something to work with. The core of Once is the music. It's what they have to work with. The studio recording session has the good feel of things coming together: it's so strong and uncalculated-feeling, it makes the studio scene in Craig Brewer's Hustle and Flow look self-conscious. In Once the sound of the music speaks without special need for dialogue or close-ups. The real love story of Once is the love of musicians playing together. Few movies perhaps have captured any better that warmth and pleasure of making music with others.

People have said this is a musical. If so, it redefines the musical as some American musicals have done recently, especially Spring Awakening and Passing Strange. What makes the idea fly is that it's as if the young man and the young woman can't express what they feel for each other, and the only way they can get their emotions across is to burst into song. But the songs are their songs, not some composer's. It's all perfectly organic.

Perfection, it turns out, doesn't have to be perfect.

Starring Glen Hansard of The Frames and Marketa Irglova.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113416,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-03-23","keywords":"independent film,ireland,payphone,watching tv,song","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Once","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275016985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWQ0YmZmY2ItNTA2NC00NzYyLTlkOTUtNjI0MmU5MTBjMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWQ0YmZmY2ItNTA2NC00NzYyLTlkOTUtNjI0MmU5MTBjMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Fox Searchlight Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0360598/","name":"Glen Hansard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2461627/","name":"Markéta Irglová"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2008013/","name":"Hugh Walsh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138809/","name":"John Carney"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018776/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065724/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012116/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138809/","name":"John Carney"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

What makes the idea fly is that it's as if the young man and the young woman can't express what they feel for each other, and the only way they can get their emotions across is to burst into song. But the songs are their songs, not some composer's. It's all perfectly organic.

Perfection, it turns out, doesn't have to be perfect.

Starring Glen Hansard of The Frames and Marketa Irglova.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113416,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-03-23","keywords":"independent film,ireland,payphone,watching tv,song","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Once","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275016985","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWQ0YmZmY2ItNTA2NC00NzYyLTlkOTUtNjI0MmU5MTBjMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWQ0YmZmY2ItNTA2NC00NzYyLTlkOTUtNjI0MmU5MTBjMDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Fox Searchlight Pictures","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0360598/","name":"Glen Hansard","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2461627/","name":"Markéta Irglová","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2008013/","name":"Hugh Walsh"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138809/","name":"John Carney"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018776/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065724/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012116/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138809/","name":"John Carney"],"duration":"PT1H26M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Callas i Pasolini - historia miłości niemożliwej
programme.desc: Opowieść o współpracy i życiu osobistym dwojga słynnych twórców. Rok 1969. Pier Paolo Pasolini realizuje film, którego fabuła osnuta jest wokół losów Medei. Odtwórczynią roli głównej jest Maria Callas. Wydarzenie to staje się punktem wyjścia do przedstawienia relacji kontrowersyjnego reżysera z największą diwą operową tamtych czasów. Opowiedzą o tym m.in. współtwórcy pamiętnego filmu.

programme.title: Parlez-moi de la pluie
Opowiedz mi o deszczu
Parlez-moi de la pluie
programme.desc:
Parlez-moi de la pluie: Directed by Agnès Jaoui. With Agnès Jaoui, Jean-Pierre Bacri, Jamel Debbouze, Pascale Arbillot. Agnes Jaoui plays a local political candidate Agathe Villanova, who returns to her childhood home in the south of France in order to help her sister Florence (Pascale Arbillot) sort through their recently deceased mother's belongings. While she's there, the son (Jamel Debbouze as Karim) of family maid (Mimouna Hadji) takes advantage of her presence and attempts to interview her as part of a documentary about successful women that he's undertaken with his film school teacher, Michel (co-writer Jean-Pierre Bacri). However, Michel's intentions aren't quite what they seem, as he's having an affair with Florence and hoping to persuade her to leave her husband. Meanwhile, Karim finds his own marriage threatened when his attractive hotel co-worker (Florence Loiret-Caille) declares an interest in him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1065332/","name":"Parlez-moi de la pluie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTI2MzkwNzY4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTkxMjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agnes Jaoui plays a local political candidate Agathe Villanova, who returns to her childhood home in the south of France in order to help her sister Florence (Pascale Arbillot) sort through their recently deceased mother's belongings","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1065332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stensson"},"dateCreated":"2009-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Talking","reviewBody":"The French are good at it. These conversation movies, there most of the action comes from the talking and there the people only exist through that.

Here we meet the high-heeled Parisian feminist, who according to the rules she keeps, has decided to have a boyfriend, decided to live alone, decided to have no children. A success story, worth a documentary to the old humbug disillusioned film-maker and the younger and more idealistic Karim of Arabian origin. By the way, Karim's mother works as a maiden in the household of the high-heeled feminist's sister.

This is funny and intelligent and not sensational. You won't remember it, but in some ways, you won't forget it either.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1795,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-09-17","keywords":"interview,f rated,life crisis,film shooting,documentarian","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Parlez-moi de la pluie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425330457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzMzEwNDgxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjEyMjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzMzEwNDgxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjEyMjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A self-centered, workaholic feminist politician grudgingly agrees to take part in a documentary on the subject of Â“successful women.""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418450/","name":"Agnès Jaoui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045870/","name":"Jean-Pierre Bacri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213354/","name":"Jamel Debbouze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418450/","name":"Agnès Jaoui"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069279/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418450/","name":"Agnès Jaoui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045870/","name":"Jean-Pierre Bacri"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gohatto
Tabu
Gohatto
programme.desc:
Gohatto: Directed by Nagisa Ôshima. With Takeshi Kitano, Ryûhei Matsuda, Shinji Takeda, Tadanobu Asano. The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0213682/","name":"Gohatto","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyMzBkZjAtNDEyYi00ZDY1LTkyZWItNjQwYmZhNjQ5MDJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwNDY4NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0213682/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chi_na_hime_chan"},"dateCreated":"2003-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing and thought provoking...","reviewBody":"Even after seeing this movie more than 20 times it still draws me in. Some of the best actors in Japan take part in this flim, most noticeable is Beat Takeshi. The story line is simply jaw dropping. This is the type of film that Hollywood probably wouldn't even dare make. To me the subject matter isn't shocking, but I've spent time in Japan and studied their language and culture extensively, but some people are offended by this. Simply because they cannot get past the little detail that these strong, powerful men can have gay tendencies.

The movie follows Kano Sozaburo as he joins the Shinshigumi (feudal era police). (Also not here that most of the main characters, except Kano and Tashiro are based off actual historical/famous people.) As Kano joins the rank, his beauty and sword skill captivate the men around him, from the other new recruit to the top ranking officers. Suddenly people begin to die, murdered in the night. Any more will give away the story.

IF you get the chance to see this movie do. For some it may be hard to get all the details and understand the little intricacies involved, and the ending may confuse some (especially if you are just going off what the subtitles say). IMDb data; ttnr: 0213682, Title: Gohatto, --- Description: Gohatto: Directed by Nagisa Ôshima. With Takeshi Kitano, Ryûhei Matsuda, Shinji Takeda, Tadanobu Asano. The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0213682/","name":"Gohatto","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyMzBkZjAtNDEyYi00ZDY1LTkyZWItNjQwYmZhNjQ5MDJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwNDY4NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0213682/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"chi_na_hime_chan","dateCreated":"2003-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing and thought provoking...","reviewBody":"Even after seeing this movie more than 20 times it still draws me in. Some of the best actors in Japan take part in this flim, most noticeable is Beat Takeshi. The story line is simply jaw dropping. This is the type of film that Hollywood probably wouldn't even dare make. To me the subject matter isn't shocking, but I've spent time in Japan and studied their language and culture extensively, but some people are offended by this. Simply because they cannot get past the little detail that these strong, powerful men can have gay tendencies.

The movie follows Kano Sozaburo as he joins the Shinshigumi (feudal era police). (Also not here that most of the main characters, except Kano and Tashiro are based off actual historical/famous people.) As Kano joins the rank, his beauty and sword skill captivate the men around him, from the other new recruit to the top ranking officers. Suddenly people begin to die, murdered in the night. Any more will give away the story.

IF you get the chance to see this movie do. For some it may be hard to get all the details and understand the little intricacies involved, and the ending may confuse some (especially if you are just going off what the subtitles say). But give it a chance, it's a wonderful film, but not for everyone (and not for the whole family ;)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7419,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-12-18","keywords":"19th century,samurai,japan,rivalry,prostitute","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001429/","name":"Takeshi Kitano","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0559430/","name":"Ryûhei Matsuda","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0847487/","name":"Shinji Takeda"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088127/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007001/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060607/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0793050/","name":"Ryôtarô Shiba","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651915/","name":"Nagisa Ôshima"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
Noc oczyszczenia: Anarchia
The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc:
The Purge: Anarchy: Directed by James DeMonaco. With Frank Grillo, Carmen Ejogo, Zach Gilford, Kiele Sanchez. Three groups of people intertwine and are left stranded in the streets on Purge Night, trying to survive the chaos and violence that occurs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2975578/","name":"The Purge: Anarchy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2ODMxMTk1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDEzNjEzMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three groups of people intertwine and are left stranded in the streets on Purge Night, trying to survive the chaos and violence that occurs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2975578/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rgkarim"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Improvement with Anarchy","reviewBody":"Last year we were introduced to the Purge, a thriller that slightly strayed from the typical path by diving into the world of legalized crime. Yes you heard me legalized crime, where for 12 hours: theft, sexual assault and even murder are free of punishment in an attempt to reduce crime as a whole. The first installment into this series, attempted to scare us with a locked down, dark house and a bunch of crazed rich people. Unfortunately for this reviewer, the movie was rather boring, a bit stupid, and lacked a lot of suspense until near the end when the action unfolded and the moral filled dialogue took a back seat. So to my surprise, the announcement of a sequel was quite shocking, and I wondered just what was in store. 

From the trailers, The Purge Anarchy showed some more bite than it's predecessor, as this time the danger was taken out of the isolated home and on to the wild streets of the most deadly night of the year. Did it deliver? Yes for the most part, as the Purge opens with three stories each from a different perspective of this night of terror: the hunted, the innocent, and the purger. In a random, and conveniently timed manner, their stories link up, as they become a band of mice escaping the various nut jobs out on the street. Within the first twenty minutes or so, the movie has much more suspense than what we saw, as the group of characters begins to partake in the most dangerous game of survival. Each of the cast is "unique" in their own way, with the Sergeant (Frank Grillo) being the cold, withdrawn elite who leads the other four weaklings through the darkness. The rest of the cast does a nice job of portraying various states of mind in a situation, yet their characters for the most part are annoying. In particular is Cali (Zoë Soul) who is the active and verbal moral speaker of the group sharing her opinions every step of the way, and overstepping her boundaries. While I appreciate the morals she is presenting and strongly believe in them, her little attitude was very annoying and I waited for some event to put her in her place. Yet it never really came. The other characters in the small party evolved over the night, developing backbones and courage to fight back in the night and not be pathetic. Cali though, stayed stubbornly naïve and annoying. 

Okay let's move past the characters and get to the rest of the movie. Anarchy's story is a continuation of the Purge's simplistic plot, adding more insight into the government that blessed this event. While a few of the plot elements are rather lackluster and emotionally deprived, they have set up a common enemy to unite against instead of random crazy strangers. The mystery behind a few of the factions is well timed, dragged on just long enough to keep you wondering, but not so long that you stop caring, helped by the less than 2 hour running time. One continues to ask why this small band of people are wanted by so many, keeping the suspense and thrills up. What also helps is that our cast is not the usual pathetic weaklings we see in horror films, but actually have skills that allow them to survive. The Sergeant in particular uses street smarts, hunter's intuition, and gun wielding to fight off those that choose to purge, leading to sporadic action scenes that liven up the film. Navigating the diverse nightmarish city also keeps things exciting as the band is forced to take detours and migrate from as the hunter's traps and tricks come to life. Some of these obstacles attempt to scare you with predictable tactics we've seen time and time again. However, most of these jumping scenes quickly change into a struggle of dominance, often leading to a pileup of victims as the hours progress. While most of the victims often erupt into a shower of bloody ruptures, the kills aren't quite as graphic or torturous as what we've seen in the past. The thing that really gets overused is the F word, which seems to be the most popular sentence filler these days, as every bout of dialogue leads to a heated use of the word. Perhaps the other adult aspect of this movie is the how soulless and twisted society has become in this movie, where emotional scandals and pent up anger is unhealthily released in sinful actions. Now older audience members are going to laugh at half of the motives, and some of the cheesy lines associated with it. Younger audience members though, may fall victim to the suggestions of this movie, so please reconsider taking them to the theater. 

The Purge Anarchy is a much better movie than I had expected, and improved miraculously from the first installment. With improved action, a better setting, and some dynamic characters, this series shows promise for the inevitable sequel that is to come. Yes there are still some overstretches, particularly in the blood, dialogue, and story, but I a film series like this one begins to expect that. Fans of the series or those looking for a decent suspense thriller should check it out; otherwise take five on this weekend. My scores for the Purge Anarchy are as followed:

Action/Horror/Thriller: 7.5 Movie Overall: 6.5","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":145553,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2014-07-18","keywords":"home invasion,murder,revenge motive,ultraviolence,senseless killing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4137462809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyODk0NzA1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzYxNzcwMjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyODk0NzA1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzYxNzcwMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young couple works to survive on the streets after their car breaks down right as the annual purge commences."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342029/","name":"Frank Grillo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252238/","name":"Carmen Ejogo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1472917/","name":"Zach Gilford"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0218621/","name":"James DeMonaco"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071240/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0098315/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0218621/","name":"James DeMonaco"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Zombie Apocalypse
Apokalipsa zombie
Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Zombie Apocalypse: Directed by Nick Lyon. With Ving Rhames, Taryn Manning, Johnny Pacar, Gary Weeks. Months after a zombie plague has wiped out 90 percent of the American population, a small group of survivors fight their way cross-country to a rumored refuge on the island of Catalina." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1876547/","name":"Zombie Apocalypse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3MTEzNjgxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQyNTA5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Months after a zombie plague has wiped out 90 percent of the American population, a small group of survivors fight their way cross-country to a rumored refuge on the island of Catalina.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1876547/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"spacejoc"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Zombie Apocalypse? More like a writing, directing, and acting apocalypse!","reviewBody":"What can I say about this stinker? Yet another "SyFy Channel Original Movie" - otherwise known as a poorly produced steaming pile of schlock. It actually took two writers to come up with this garbage? It isn't even good for purely mocking purposes. Makeup people - when you feature a zombie in a fight, make sure you glue down their prosthetics! Computer animation effects team - you have to animate the rounds going into the gun, not just the empty shells exiting the breach . . . Ving, what happened to your career? Whew!\n\nHow is it remotely possible that SyFy can produce such great original series, but the absolute WORST movies? For good zombie fare, check out "The Walking Dead," where you actually care about the characters and the writing, direction and acting are solid. Don't waste your time - avoid this one at all costs!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5177,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Horror"],"datePublished":"2011-10-29","keywords":"explosion,zombie animal,dog,urination,severed head","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Zombie Apocalypse","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1979948569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJhMGMyYTEtMGViNi00MDU0LWI0YjAtZWUzZTE4YjNjYWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJhMGMyYTEtMGViNi00MDU0LWI0YjAtZWUzZTE4YjNjYWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Zombie Apocalypse"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000609/","name":"Ving Rhames"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1067251/","name":"Johnny Pacar"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528963/","name":"Nick Lyon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4627875/","name":"Craig Engler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2399128/","name":"Brooks Peck"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: True Bloodthirst
Vampyre Nation: Nacja wampirów
True Bloodthirst
programme.desc: True Bloodthirst: Directed by Todor Chapkanov. With Andrew Lee Potts, Heida Reed, Claudia Bassols, Ben Lambert. Set in a not-too-distant future in which a synthetic blood substitute, dispensed by the Romanian government, allows humans and vampires to potentially co-exist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1982882/","name":"True Bloodthirst","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEyODQ0MTkxNDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE0ODcwMTMx._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a not-too-distant future in which a synthetic blood substitute, dispensed by the Romanian government, allows humans and vampires to potentially co-exist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1982882/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaSerf"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Makes "Penny Dreadful" look good...","reviewBody":"I have to say that at times I thought I had accidentally stumbled upon a gay vampire thriller.... The "tense" scenes between Andrew Lee Potts and Ben Lambert (who looks like a pale, very pale, imitation of Paul Bettany here) made me want to shout something along the lines of "just kiss, already!" at the screen. However, they don't (sorry if that constitutes a spoiler) and we set off a fairly typical amalgam of "Underworld" style vampire v human set-piece battles as the good humans and vampires unite to stop the bad ones from trying to exterminate one and other. Of course, truth and trust rise above all this chaos and alongside Neil Jackson and Heida Reed we head to the cataclysmic denouement with lots of oomph but little enthusiasm. The effects are better than OK, but the dialogue is strained from the start; the accents risible and sadly, it is not at all scary.... Afraid I'd just give this a miss...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1628,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.2},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2012-07-14","keywords":"vampire human coexistence,blood substitute","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Vampyre Nation","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3731400729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjEzZjAxYjItNzczNi00MTU4LTg0YmQtMzQ0ZGM1MThkMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjEzZjAxYjItNzczNi00MTU4LTg0YmQtMzQ0ZGM1MThkMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Vampyre Nation"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498517/","name":"Andrew Lee Potts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4008100/","name":"Heida Reed"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2218213/","name":"Claudia Bassols"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1359237/","name":"Todor Chapkanov"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186146/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080897/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0201678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0337962/","name":"Jeffrey Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1878140/","name":"Rafael Jordan"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: In Her Skin
W jej skórze
In Her Skin
programme.desc: In Her Skin: Directed by Simone North. With Guy Pearce, Miranda Otto, Ruth Bradley, Sam Neill. This is what every parent fears: their child not coming home when they're meant to. When the fifteen-year-old student, Rachel Barber, doesn't climb off the tram to meet her dad, Elizabeth, her mother, and Mike, her dad, bolt into action." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0995851/","name":"In Her Skin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NzIwMDQ3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgyMzA2Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is what every parent fears: their child not coming home when they're meant to. When the fifteen-year-old student, Rachel Barber, doesn't climb off the tram to meet her dad, Elizabeth, her mother, and Mike, her dad, bolt into act","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0995851/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielle_gale"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Powerful movie with a long lasting impression","reviewBody":"This a powerful movie with a long lasting impression. I think Simone did a fantastic job with this story. She kept to the actual events of what happened to Rachel, her family, friends as well as Caroline without glorifying it, sugar coating it and hollywoodising it. It is real and it is raw. This is what happened and this is how the people involved experienced it. The acting is fantastic, the way the scenes flow and the cinematography is excellent. Along with the true story there are messages to take from it, one being involved and recognizing mental illness, as we know is a massive and growing problem in the community.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4878,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"keywords":"missing person,fat girl,obsession,woman murders a woman,young murderer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"In Her Skin","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1286642969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxNzU5NDAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzI4NDA2NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxNzU5NDAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzI4NDA2NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Consumed with self-loathing, nineteen-year-old Caroline covets, stalks, abducts then murders fifteen-year-old Rachel Barber whom she considers "perfect"; everything she is not: beautiful, self-assured, happy. programme.title: Sugarhouse
Sugarhouse
programme.desc:
Sugarhouse: Directed by Gary Love. With Steven Mackintosh, Ashley Walters, Andy Serkis, Adam Deacon. Determined to kill his wife's lover, a middle-class accountant attempts to purchase a .38 from an inner-city crackhead, unaware the gun actually belongs to a psychotic drug lord who'd kill to get his weapon back." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0847526/","name":"Sugarhouse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWUxZGM1YzEtNWYwYi00Y2UxLTg0OTMtZmFmY2Q2ZDFmMzg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ5MzY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Determined to kill his wife's lover, a middle-class accountant attempts to purchase a .38 from an inner-city crackhead, unaware the gun actually belongs to a psychotic drug lord who'd kill to get his weapon back.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0847526/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BlackNarcissus"},"dateCreated":"2007-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rather Good new Brit Film","reviewBody":"I got an invite to see a Preview screening of Sugarhouse Lane last Wednesday & it was a well attended affair in a Hotel screening Room.

The film is set in London, but not the tourist type London you'll have seen in most British Films. Thankfully there's no shot of 'The Gherkin' building which seems to have plagued all films set in London since around 2000.

Most of the action (if thats the right word) takes place in around a derelict warehouse in/or around a Council estate. D takes Tom to this place in order to do some business but has other plans. Unfortunately this is were the films Stage origins let it down because, the film becomes wordy & rather confined to this single location. The film is beautiful to look at, the DoP should be very proud of themselves. I saw the film in the company of a Film Director and that was a comment he agreed with. Look out for the final Crane shot at the end of the film which is just great..

As to the performances, there's a really great performance from Ashley Walters as D a Crack Addict/Hustler. IMHO it much more than the clichéd "Blackman Druggie" part British Black actors are asked to play. It's a really convincing turn as an addict up there with Willie Ross's Drunk Father in 'Rita, Sue and Bob Too' and Samuel L. Jackson's performance in 'Jungle Fever'. There's also a good performance from Andy Serkis as Hoodwink a Northern Irish hard man. Oh, look out for the girl who plays Hoodwinks girlfriend I think in the titles she's called 'Pregnant Girl'. She's in the film for no more than 5 - 6 minutes tops but there's something really striking about her. 

I must admit I was expecting something different but that said, I was pleasantly surprised. The film is much better than say other films set in London with Urban theme's like 'Breaking and Entering'. A film well worth having a look at when or if it gets a UK Theatrical release.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1293,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-08-24","keywords":"bully,beating,male full back nudity,bare butt,male nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sugarhouse","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2882863897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNDA2Mjg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzNTMyMg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNDA2Mjg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzNTMyMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Movie Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0533599/","name":"Steven Mackintosh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910180/","name":"Ashley Walters"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0785227/","name":"Andy Serkis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522327/","name":"Gary Love"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009090/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132203/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0187060/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2364947/","name":"Dominic Leyton"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Darkness Falls
Gdy zapada zmrok
Darkness Falls
programme.desc:
Darkness Falls: Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. With Chaney Kley, Emma Caulfield Ford, Lee Cormie, Grant Piro. A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0282209/","name":"Darkness Falls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjcwOGM4ZDUtOGFiZS00YTAxLWExMTQtMWQ1NGU2NTZjYjg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0282209/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LessThanPaddy"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Severe nightmares once upon a time...","reviewBody":"Okay, I admit this may not be a great movie, but I don't think it is the worst either. However, I do think I'm only saying that because I loved it as a kid. Honestly, it was always the choice of scary film for me and my friends at sleepovers etc. It was scary, the tooth-fairy character is my idea of a worst nightmare, and believe me she gave me plenty in the years that followed. I haven't seen it in a few years and while it may not haunt me anymore I suspect it would give me an intermediate shiver if I watched it again today.

Usually I bash films like this. There are probably better horror films out there that I've given worse reviews too, but this one holds sentimental value for me and I genuinely believe that it's not THAT bad. The acting isn't wonderful and the story plays out a bit predictably... I still quite like the premise though and the legend behind Matilda the tooth-fairy.

If you scare easily, I wouldn't recommend you watch this alone. The movie might not be top, but it is full of jumps and the villain is horrifying. Enjoy (with the lights on).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31047,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Fantasy","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-05-21","keywords":"tooth fairy,darkness,night terrors,fear of the dark,supernatural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Darkness Falls","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3634364697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0YTA0YzEtZTcyMS00YmI2LTkyZDEtNzg0MWYxZmUyZmJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0YTA0YzEtZTcyMS00YmI2LTkyZDEtNzg0MWYxZmUyZmJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Sony Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1015096/","name":"Chaney Kley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146536/","name":"Emma Caulfield Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1112328/","name":"Antony Burrows"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509448/","name":"Jonathan Liebesman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022564/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364899/","name":"Joe Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004591/","name":"John Fasano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0888743/","name":"James Vanderbilt"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="
